website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Yoga 900 premium convertible-hybrid laptop is a wonder of engineering, with a complex multimode hinge that lets you use it in a wide variety of positions. Yet it measures just a half-inch thick.
pros: Almost 11 hours of battery life in our tests
cons: Screen colors aren't as bright as that of rivals
Connecting to an external display requires a separate USB-C adapter

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last two years before developing physical faults
customer_reviews.text: Cable failed inside 2 years, not happy. The seller Laptop Outlet continually refers me back to the manufacturer and has no interest in resolving the problem as it is out of the Manufacturers 12 month Warranty period. When I contact the manufacturer they direct me to a website which clearly states that the faulty parts have a 24 month warranty. When I called the seller and explained that they have obligations, they told me to contact Trading Standards. I would not recommend either this product or LAPTOP OUTLET as being reliable

customer_reviews.title: Excellent laptop.

customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine. BUT wish it had fingerprint reader (long passwords are a pain) and Think pad red nipped controller (I dislike track pad) Otherwise pretty flawless Battery lasts a working day which is great and it looks sleek, especially the watch hinge

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better if they had stuck to standards
customer_reviews.text: This product is almost as good as I expected with one significant reservation. It works as a portable device but trying to connect it to fixed appliances in an office has revealed flaws in the design. There is no HDMI port, the USB 3 Type-C port being used instead. The Type-C port does not appear to conform to the standard and is a proprietary implementation. This is frustrating since third-party products will not work correctly, particularly docking devices and HDMI+Hub adapters. Since Lenovo don't make a docking unit for this range it is both inconsiderate and stupid!
customer_reviews.author: sputnik

customer_reviews.title: What an absolute waste of my hard-earned money
customer_reviews.text: What an absolute waste of my hard-earned money. I wouldn't recommend it to my worst enemy. Difficult to know whether it's the Lenovo or the Windows 10, or a combination of the two, but it has a mind of it's own. It's the worst laptop I've ever had the misfortune to buy. Lenovo have lost ONE customer. I won't be going back! Unfortunately I've been overseas since I bought it. If I'd been in the UK I would have sent it back!!

customer_reviews.title: Lenovo Yoga 900 a good buy?

INNOVATIVE WATCHBAND DESIGN The YOGA 900 introduces a unique watchband design. It's made from 813 individual components for a more fluid transition between modes.
PROVEN TO LAST LONGER The YOGA 900 has an enhanced 66-Whr battery that delivers up to 9 hours of local video playback* (with display brightness set at 200 nits and Wi-Fi off.)
